title: Rod Serling and the Twilight Zone - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/7/20
itunes:title: Rod Serling and the Twilight Zone - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/7/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and author Arlen Schumer recount the creative influence of the classic television series the Twilight Zone, and how writer and host Rod Serling put many social commentary messages into his science fiction scripts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
